function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly infectious SARS-CoV-2 virus spreading between people in close contact","Impact":"Devastating consequences in social, cultural, and economic aspects. Significant job losses and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Containment measures to minimize contact between people, mandatory use of masks, minimum safety distance","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, air filtration devices","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers"},{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 leading to significant confirmed cases and deaths","Impact":"Overwhelming healthcare systems, increased mortality rates, economic losses","Mitigation":"Vaccination programs, travel restrictions, quarantine measures, public health education","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing kits, telemedicine, virtual health consultations","People":"General public, healthcare workers, travelers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
